app.changeLog:
- Full rework
- Fixed not opening on some windows 11 installs
- Added actual error handling
- Automatic plugin repair, installs and updates
- Reworked UI
  - Added main menu
  - Reworked "sound manager"
  - Remade truck adder screen
  - Added settings page

plugin.changeLog:
- Fixed bank unload crash if the file is missing (invalid handling fix)
- Fixed some mercedes interior sounds not being handled correctly
- Fixed retarder level stick not playing a sound on every click
